text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Whoa! Please don't worry about it!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I know the sadness of not being able to finish when it counts all too well!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
...Somehow, saying that is making me lose confidence too...
Maybe I'll get the spider plushie next time...
It ended in a disappointing result...
